Gif-App

{{item | titlecase}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { GifServiceService } from '../../gifs/service/gif.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sidebar', templateUrl: './sidebar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sidebar.component.css'] }) export class SidebarComponent { get historial() { return this._GifService.historial.filter(resp=>resp !== '') } constructor( private _GifService: GifServiceService ){ } }
